name: Electric Last Mile Solutions, Inc.
description: Electric Last Mile Solutions, Inc. is a forward-thinking company dedicated to transforming urban transportation through electric vehicles (EVs). Founded in 2020, the company focuses on addressing the growing demand for sustainable last-mile delivery solutions. With a mission to provide eco-friendly alternatives to traditional delivery vehicles, ELMSQ designs and manufactures electric vans and trucks that are tailored for urban logistics. Their flagship product, the Urban Utility Vehicle, is designed for efficiency and versatility, boasting a spacious cargo area while maintaining a compact footprint ideal for city driving. ELMSQ is committed to reducing the carbon footprint of the transportation sector by offering zero-emission vehicles that help businesses meet their sustainability goals. The company also invests in smart technology to optimize fleet management and enhance operational efficiency. As urban areas continue to grow, ELMSQ aims to lead the charge towards a cleaner, more sustainable future in urban logistics.

seo.meta_title: Electric Last Mile Solutions, Inc. | Sustainable Urban Transportation
seo.meta_description: Explore Electric Last Mile Solutions, Inc., a leader in electric vehicle manufacturing dedicated to transforming urban logistics with sustainable solutions.

faq.question: What does Electric Last Mile Solutions focus on?
faq.answer: Electric Last Mile Solutions focuses on providing electric vehicles for urban logistics and last-mile delivery.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Electric Last Mile Solutions?
faq.answer: Jim Taylor is the CEO of Electric Last Mile Solutions, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Electric Last Mile Solutions headquartered?
faq.answer: Electric Last Mile Solutions is headquartered in Detroit, Michigan, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does Electric Last Mile Solutions offer?
faq.answer: The company offers electric vehicles, including the Urban Utility Vehicle and Delivery Van.

faq.question: When was Electric Last Mile Solutions founded?
faq.answer: Electric Last Mile Solutions was founded in 2020.
